A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this film. Not just because I'm a huge Star War fan\, but because it was genuinely great. It brought a new and exciting tone to the Star Wars universe. The movie does suffer from having a couple bland characters\, but makes up for it with amazing ones. Rey and Kylo go through an amazing journey in this film and I am exicted to see where it leads. Overall a solid entry into the ever growing Star Wars Universe!
